mapper.select: SELECT act.acnumber, act.acbalance, act.bankName, cs.name, act.acPwd, act.trsfLimit FROM ACCOUNT_TBL act, CUSTOMER cs WHERE act.id = cs.id AND act.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRANSFER_TBL(tNum, acNumber, tDepositnum, tDepositBank, tType, tAmount, myMemo, yourMemo, tDate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(tNum) + 1, 1) FROM TRANSFER_TBL), #{acNumber}, #{tDepositnum}, #{tDepositBank}, #{tType}, #{tAmount}, #{myMemo}, #{yourMemo}, sysdate)

INSERT INTO auto_transferReg_tbl(aNum,acNumber,aDepositNum,aDepositBank,aDepositAmount,aTransferCycle,aStartDate,aEndDate,myMemo,yourMemo) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(aNum) + 1, 1) FROM auto_transferReg_tbl), #{acNumber}, #{aDepositnum}, #{aDepositBank}, #{aDepositAmount}, #{aTransferCycle}, #{aStartDate},#{aEndDate},#{myMemo},#{yourMemo})
